Material used.Description: The resultant mRNA levels were quantified by qRT-PCR using the NSC-34 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: qRT-PCR showed a 60% reduction in mRNA levels, and Western blot confirmed a decrease in SMN protein levels for the variant NM_000377.2:c.1234A>T.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were used for both qRT-PCR and Western blot.

Technical replicates.Description: Two technical replicates were used for both qRT-PCR and Western blot.

Basic positive control.Description: A plasmid containing wild-type *SMN1* served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control described in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was performed for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Not specifically defined in the text.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% was considered abnormal.
